actions.name: Silk Trap

cost.trigger: The user is targeted by an Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted by an Attack.

Effect: The triggering attack fails to hit the user, and additional attacks also fail to hit until the user's next Activation, or when the round ends, whichever is first. Attacks failing to hit this way do not activate their secondary effects. If the triggering Attack has [Contact], the attacker loses -1 SPD Stages for 5 Activations.
